name: C#ICKEN QUEST
description:
Explore a total of 40 different levels in this adventure-puzzle game where you will learn the basics of gameplay programming using Unity and C#.

Avoid the enemies, pick the mushrooms and collect the book to complete your journey back to your rooster friend where you will be challenged to test your knowledge on the level's topic.

PS: the game does not feature a saving system but you can freely select the levels you want to play (and continue from there).

This game was my Final Year Project's artefact for the Bachelor of Science Games Development degree I completed at Buckinghamshire New University. 

The game was awarded the 2020 IET Buckinghamshire Local Network Prize by The Institution of Engineering and Technology in regards to achieving the highest mark for the FYP out of the whole Computer department.
